title: MythicMobs里的生物能被弓箭消耗
author: Aegean_
txt_content: 想做个RPG服，但发现MM里的怪物能被弓箭直接从远处耗死，有什么方法可以解决吗。。。

replies.txt_content:
3:
  Mobtype: IRON_GOLEM
  Display: '&c铁'
  Health: 1500
  Damage: 0
  Drops:
  - exp 3 1
  - money 30 1
  Equipment:
  Options:
    PreventOtherDrops: true   
    MaxCombatDistance: 5
    MovementSpeed: 0.25



   MaxCombatDistance: 5  就是5格外免疫弓箭伤害
提供几个思路， 加速， 缴械，召唤小弟挡弓箭或者加击退保护(忘了游戏里叫啥，就是被打不会被击退)

如果我没记错的话，以前我好像看到过一个可以限制怪物受到远处伤害的距离的选项的。 ...
MaxCombatDistance: [number]

The mob cannot be damaged by players further away than # many blocks.
Setting this option to a number less than the distance of a certain mob skill or attack will ensure that the mob can damage the player and will not be as easy to exploit. 
直接写数字在MaxCombatDistance: 就可以了设定多少格之外不能伤害到怪物既然是放风筝，建议设定的跟怪物攻击距离同等或攻击距离+1到2
